name: Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches
summary: Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches is a first person horror game in which you must solve puzzles to reach the end and find all the answers.

name: Rheum
summary: Jump down the esophagus of a body plagued by viruses and big bad bosses in this reverse vertical scrolling shoot'em up! Collect eye crusties, upgrade your pupils, and clear the screen of bullets with your cornea crushing eye blasts!

name: Rhythmic
summary: RHYTHMIC combines the fast-paced VR rhythm-game genre with tactical tower defense. Collect magical particles in tune with epic music and skillfully unleash powerful spells upon invading enemies to defend the people whose only hope is your prowess!

name: Rhythm Stones
summary: Rhythm Stones is a 1 button 3D rhythm game that crosses moving stepping stones.

name: Rhythm Animal Café
summary: Welcome to ​Rhythm Animal Café​! Animals' daily chaos meets funky beats: boss hype, colleague woes, your slacking, unfair blame—all become hilarious one-tap rhythm games! Simple controls, joyful groove. Feel music fuse with daily life’s warmth!

name: Rhino Rumble
summary: It's amazing what some animals will do just to get a drink of water. Take Rocky the Rhino, for instance: Positively parched (he ate way too many peppers at a local jungle party), the little fellow is willing to traverse 19 enormous levels in the hope of quenching his mighty thirst. Help the adorable Rocky get through seven unique worlds, fending off all who would stand in his way. Many of the jungle's inhabitants are convinced that Rocky will drink up the water supply, you see, so they're all working against you from the outset. Make your way through forests and caves, using unique artillery like fireball breath and belly jumps to squelch the attempts of your foes and get to the magical spring. In addition to your weaponry, you'll have the assistance of various boats, planes, trampolines, and wagons to reach the end of each level.

name: Rhythm Overdrive
summary: Rhythm Overdrive is a shootem up / rhythm game, where ennemies are trying to kill you while dancing on the musics BPM ! Collect power ups to enhance your weapons, use bombs to clean the screen from all the ennemies, and try to get the first places on the leaderboards !

name: Rhythm Thief & the Paris Caper
summary: An abridged iOS version of the 3DS game Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure, adding new minigames and a microtransaction system.

name: Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess
summary: Join Kururu on her journey to find true love and experience the charm of Rhapsody II's storybook adventure!

name: Rhythm of the Gods
summary: Join the strongest mortal warrior, Lyrik, and slide, jump & slash to the beat to please the Gods of Rhythm! Solve the problems that the mortal realm faces in this auto-running, Greek-inspired rhythm game. Keep in time and reveal each gods' true tune with unique beatmaps.

name: Rhythm 'n Bullets
summary:
An arcade shmup where the music is part of the action

Travel across the virtual zone and defend the core by guiding a pair of starfighters through the shoot 'em up action of Rhythm 'n Bullets. Enemies fly in from all sides, diving towards the core in time with the soundtrack. Time your shots to the beat for maximum effect, and grab awesome power-ups to clear the stage.

Keep the core safe from danger in the multi-level campaign, and then try to top the leaderboards in endless mode, where the enemies never stop!

name: Rhem IV SE: The Golden Fragments
summary:
RHEM IV takes you into a huge, fantastic world full of strange vehicles and buildings, secret passages and doorways. A sense of adventure, logic, attentiveness and the ability to solve puzzles will help the player to slowly but surely unveil the mystery of this latest adventure on the island RHEM.

Features:
- Non linear gameplay: a fascinating world full of riddles and enigmas
- an abundance of exciting secret rooms and hidden paths
- new „album“ feature allowing you to collect and use hints
- family friendly and non-violent gameplay
- color picker feature allowing the color-blind to solve puzzles
- SE edition features several unseen areas

name: Rhythm Katana Dance
summary: RKD is a first-person rhythm game where you can deflect bullets, dash, and slice enemies with a katana in perfect sync with your own beat using the in-game custom music editor.

name: Rhem 3: The Secret Library
summary: In this third installment of the popular RHEM series of intricate pure-puzzle first-person adventure games, the adventures of brothers Kales and Zetais continue in the mysterious land of RHEM.

name: Rhem II SE: The Cave
summary:
Rhem II SE: The Cave is an intricate pure-puzzle first person adventure game. The player explores a hidden city far beneath the earths surface. RHEM II SE features non-linear gameplay non-violent story and mind-bending puzzles.

NEW compared to the original RHEM 2
- extended version of the original RHEM 2
- new area and new puzzles
- build-in color-picker

name: Rhythia
summary: Rhythia is a rhythm-based game on a 3x3 grid where you must aim at the blocks flying towards you. You can play it in first person, or with a static camera.

name: Rhythm Typer
summary: A rhythm game where you use your keyboard to type along to the beat!

name: Rhino Express
summary: Lost under the red sun, a rhino must deliver packages across the savanna! Help our rhino through fun puzzle challenges where every step counts. Can you help complete all deliveries?

name: Rhythm Knights
summary: Rhythm Knights is a unique, musical rhythm game about a group of ragtag knights seeking vengeance on an evil king who destroyed their home. The king bear hired 8 evil monsters to stop you from seeking your revenge! Click the notes as they come down to take down your foes!

name: Rhythm Knights: Double Treble
summary: Play as the Rhythm Knights in this hand-drawn colorful rhythm fighter reimagining. Featuring tons of levels, a brand new input system, and online multi-player. This package also contains a full remastered version of the original game! This is the ultimate Rhythm Knights package!

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles
summary: Enjoy the next verse of Marl Kingdom adventures with Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess and Rhapsody III: Memories of Marl Kingdom! Join Kururu, the daughter of Cornet and Ferdinand, as she pursues her dreams of true love, and experience these classic RPGs in full forte as they take center stage! With improved visuals, a heart-warming story, a charming soundtrack, and an emotional conclusion, Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles comes ready to win your heart as it makes its welcome western debut!

name: Rhyme Rider Kerorican
summary:
Rhyme Rider Kerorican is a music video game in the style of Vib-Ribbon, an earlier game developed by the same studio. The game's plot is quite simple involving the adventures of Kerorican, a female astronaut wearing kemonomimi-style frog-helmet, as she walks along accompanied by jazzy techno music. As Kerorican continues her walk, she encounters more and more enemies and obstacles. Kerorican must jump, duck, kick aside, or otherwise dodge these obstacles to progress and as she does so, the actions she takes add notes to the song such that the player's actions results in a generative melody. By successfully clearing strings of obstacles, Kerorican's combo count increases and this can result in a reward to the player of a crown that acts to skip the player over obstacles. This game is played with the WonderSwan Color held diagonally, the only game on the system to do so. This is why all text in the game is oblique.

The game has been criticized for difficulty of gameplay as timing and tricky button combinations often result in the player's death. The game also only contains 4 levels so replayability-value has also been considered a negative factor.

name: Rhythm Reunion
summary: The band is getting back together! Haven't you heard?! 'Summer Vacation' is reuniting for one last gig! Take part in this artistically diverse visual novel as you explore the new lives of each of the old band members, all whilst you convince each of them to return to the lime light!

name: Rhythm Lust Girl 2
summary: Rhythm Lust Girl 2 is a casual puzzle game. There are 24 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Rhythm Sprout
summary:
Rhythm Sprout is a handcrafted fast-paced rhythm action with original music and a wacky story mode.

Enjoy chill Lo-fi walks and fight bosses to K-POP, EDM and Hip-Hop inspired tracks. Features a quirky story, 30 handcrafted levels, and various EX-modes to refresh your gameplay.

name: Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure
summary: Rhythm Thief & the Emperor's Treasure sees players enter the secret life of Raphael, infamous among Parisians as an honorable thief for stealing famous works of art only to return them days later. Dive into Raphael's world and help him find the Wristlet of Tiamat to unmask the mystery behind his father's disappearance. While unravelling the truth players will encounter an assortment of different rhythm challenges to master. Tap the screen, swipe the stylus and control the gyro to the beat of the music to maneuver Raphael through the unique streets of Paris, brought to life by stylish animations and vibrant 3D maps and landscapes.

name: Rhythm Town: Music Visualizer
summary: Rhythm Town is a cozy music-driven sandbox where your world moves to the beat. Upload your favorite tracks from your PC, place objects freely, and watch as everything sways, pulses, and comes to life with the rhythm. No challenges or pressure—just pure creativity and musical relaxation.

name: Rhombus Legends
summary: A unique spatial battle system for card games. Unite with friends for clan wars, explore the dungeons and search world map for Bosses. Magical power awaits you!

name: Rhythmetric
summary: Defeat your geometric foes by placing attack, move, and shield elements in a rhythmic sequence to catchy music loops.

name: Rhythm Hotel
summary: Rhythm Hotel is open! Grab your camera and capture Einstein’s secret identity! Next door, Socrates is in a heated debate with a stubborn donkey. Don’t panic! It’s our special rhythm challenge — fall behind the beat and you might get kicked into a dimensional rift by the donkey!

name: Rhythm Tengoku
summary: Rhythm Tengoku was ported to the Sega NAOMI Arcade system, with higher-quality graphics and an exclusive new set of minigames.

name: Rhythm Doggo
summary: You wanted to play a video game and just got transformed into a dog! Rhythm Doggo is a classic platform adventure where you play as a dog and make music on the way. Can you go back to your human form?

name: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure DS
summary: Port on the Nintendo DS, the gameplay has been changed significantly, and the battles are presented in 2D strategy-RPG type identical to the game's sequels. Kururu also engages in battle and the characters sprites are different in this version of the game.

name: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit
summary: Rhapsody of the Moon Rabbit is a second player game in Valkyrie Studio. You will operate Reisen Udongein Inaba and Youmu Konpaku,smash the plot of the scientific eccentric.

name: Rhythm Action Gatsby
summary: The best medium to experience F. Scott Fitzgerald's American classic - Rhythm Action

name: Rhythm Heaven Groove
summary: The rhythm is starting up again! Rhythm Heaven Groove comes to Nintendo Switch!

name: Rhythm Bang
summary: Rhythm based aiming game focused around hard electronic music. Aim the blaster with your mouse as it blasts rhythmically to the music, and aim at the falling blocks!

name: Rhizomatic Compound
summary: Investigate a mysterious colony on a distant alien planet in this hand drawn sci-fi tale of exploitation and collapse from the influential Decadence collective. Explore ruins, hack terminals, reprogram cellular life forms, and cultivate fungi spores to disrupt and penetrate the hostile environment.

name: Rhythmic Flip (Re)Turn
summary: Remember where the adorable animals are hiding, then flip them to the rhythm! Test your memory and timing in RizFuri-tan, the charming flip-and-match rhythm game!

name: Rhythm
summary:
Rhythm is a small minimalistic 2D Music based Action Game
where you have to avoid Hexagon's flying towards you.

name: Rhythm Rush!
summary: Play your own songs to three different game modes on, newly updated to, eight different maps, or fight the three unlockable bosses! Play on four different difficulties to get a range of challenge! Keep track of your stats and compare them to your friends! Earn all the achievements by playing and getting better at it! Play more songs on harder difficulties to rank up faster! It is easy to grasp but hard to master! Play any song you want by just dragging them into a folder! The game reads MP3s, OGGs, and WAVs!

name: Rhino's Rage
summary:
It is a turn-based tactical game, where you can accelerate and bunt enemies.
There is a game mode for one player in different modes with own combat mechanics and characters with unique team roles are used in the game: pusher, stopper, tumbleweed and sprinter.
Also you can play with your friends against each other on various maps.

name: RhythmStrike
summary: Fast-paced, vertical scrolling rhythm game that utilizes both the keyboard and mouse

name: Rhyolite
summary: Rhyolite is a 1-4 player co-op action roguelike set on a steampunk locomotive being attacked by ghost trains. Defend, repair, and upgrade your train as you search the railway for a portal to the spirit world.

name: Rhythmetallic
summary: Enter the world of heavy metal music! This heavy metal rhythm game features an ever-growing collection of heavy metal tracks spanning various sub-genres with classic tap style gameplay (Guitar Hero etc.), A must-play for heavy metal fans and rhythm game lovers! Play and headbang now!

name: Rhythm Storm
summary: Rhythm Storm is a roguelike bullet heaven with stunning vector graphics, rhythmic action, and overwhelming swarms of enemies. Your vehicle aims and fires automatically while everything else dances and moves to the beat in this spectacular audio-visual experience.

name: Rhythm Hell
summary: Help a poor seal out by clapping back the rhythms shown! Clapping on cue makes the meter go up, missing cues makes the meter go down! Aim for the highest score as the difficulty slowly progresses!

name: Rhythmic Keyboard
summary: Rhythmic Keyboard is a music-based typing game with integration of a talent system that allows for the player to increase their effectiveness. Procedurally spawned keys inhibit pattern formation, so reaction speed and hand/eye coordination are a priority -- not memorization.

name: Rhell: Warped Worlds & Troubled Times
summary: Create unique spells by combining magical runes to solve puzzles your way. Transform objects, manipulate time, and discover the mysteries of a world where everyone has vanished, leaving only 12 people behind. Every puzzle has multiple solutions - if you can imagine it, you can probably do it.

name: Rhythm Doctor
summary: Save patients with your rhythm mastery! Rhythm Doctor is a rhythm game where you heal patients by defibrillating in time to their heartbeats. Learn each patient's unique heartbeat and defeat boss viruses trying to sabotage your rhythm, all set to heart-pumping, soul-soothing music.

name: Rhombus
summary:
Rhombus is a first-person puzzle game where you build your path through panels controlling platforms. Explore and find your way through a compact environment in this small metroidbrainia.

Features
- Unique puzzle mechanic that plays with perspective
- Compact 'open-world' environment with multiple paths & non-linear exploration
- Estimated length of 2-3 hours - perfect for a single evening/afternoon

name: Rhythm of the Universe: Ionia
summary: Ionia is a single-player fantasy-adventure puzzle VR game for all ages. Get up close with music-inspired creatures in a lush forest teeming with life. Discover music-based magic on your quest to save the Harpa, a mythical creature whose habitat is on the brink of destruction.

name: Rhythm Race
summary: A racing game in which you don't take the wheel. Get into the music rhythm and accelerate towards victory in this exciting mix of neon, rhythm and futuristic cars.

name: Rhem 4: The Golden Fragments
summary: Rhem 4 reveals another yet unknown part of the mysterious island of Rhem. The story continues where "Rhem 3: The Secret Library" ended, but the game can also be played independently of the Rhem Trilogy.

name: Rhem 2: The Cave
summary:
RHEM 2 is an adventure game from Knut Müller and Got Game Entertainment and the sequel to RHEM. It is distributed as a Macromedia Director file.

Like Myst and Riven, Rhem 2 is a node-based first-person adventure game. The player explores a series of caverns in search of a certain artifact. The puzzles involve spatial reasoning, operating machinery, and logic.

name: Rhem
summary: Rhem is an adventure game in which the player explores a barren, maze-like landscape of water ponds, walkways, and brick buildings with the aid of a partial map. The game has several puzzles involving machines and symbols.

name: Rhythm of Annihilation
summary: Rhythm of Annihilation is a rhythm-based third-person shooter. Sync to the beat and battle through a world on the brink of annihilation!

name: Rhythm Rabbit
summary: A fast-paced rhythm action game where you automatically move on the beat of the music, but the amount of steps changes on each move. React fast in order to progress or end up dying repeatedly.

name: Rhythm Survivors
summary: Rhythm Survivors is a single player musical survivor-like. Fight off hordes of increasingly numerous monsters while collecting upgrades to compose powerful sequences of attacks. Only with perfect rhythm can you hope to survive the night!

name: Rhythm Towers
summary: Dance. Defend. Adapt. Use your rhythm matching skills to build defensive towers, in order to fight back mysterious hordes of creatures that will stop at nothing to destroy the planet's rhythm core.

name: Rhythm Heaven Fever
summary: Summary: Known as "Beat the Beat: Rhythm Paradise" in the UK/EU. Feel the Beat and Get into the Rhythm Rhythm Heaven Fever promise to be the quirkiest, most charming rhythm game you and your friends will ever play.

name: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure
summary:
Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure, released in Japan as The Puppet Princess of Marl Kingdom is a tactical role-playing game for the PlayStation from Atlus USA and Nippon Ichi Software, the creators of Disgaea, and is part of the Marl Kingdom series.

Rhapsody, along with its sequels, are considered musical RPGs, meaning in place of FMV cutscenes, there are musical numbers, complete with vocals. The game is also known for its "overwhelming cuteness" and low level of difficulty. Although this may make the game seem geared towards a younger audience, in Japan, the game and series in general has seen much success.

name: Rhythm Rewind
summary: A funky retro-inspired rhythm game made for brackeys jam 2020.2

name: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix
summary: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix is a full, CTGP-style sequel/refresh of Rhythm Heaven Megamix, featuring custom games, custom remixes, ported games from across the series, completely new games, and more.

name: Rhom Bus
summary: New, addictive and clever game mechanics in a beautiful and carefully designed world of rhombuses. Turn the tiles or turn the board to complete the levels and help the animals getting on the bus.

name: Rhythm Core Alpha 2
summary: Rhythm Core Alpha 2 is an advanced music creation and performance tool.

name: Rhythm de Cooking: Sweets Party e Youkoso
Rhythm Hero
summary: Rhythm Hero is a game played only with mouse clicks and wheels in hexagonal spaces. You can play with various songs using the mouse like a joystick.

name: Rhythm Dash
summary: In Rhythm Dash you get to jump in and help destroy all the alien ​robots with the power of music!

name: RhythmPG
summary: The turn based, rhythm based Synthwave inspired RPG

name: Rhythmy
summary: "Rhythmy" is a new arcade-style rhythm bullet hell game actually in development.

name: Rhythm Dodge
summary: Rhythm Dodge is a retro styled music based game where instead of hitting notes on the rhythm of the music you have to dodge them. You play as two sides that you control independently. Making you test your eye-hand coordination.

name: Rhythm Core Alpha
summary: Rhythm Core Alpha is an advanced music creation system for the Nintendo DSi.

name: Rhythm Stars Climbing
summary: Rock climb to the rhythm and beat to become the best star

name: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure
summary: PS5 Port of "Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure".

name: Rhyme Player
summary: A musical game from Konami

name: Rhythmcremental
summary: an incrementally evolving drum machine

name: Rhythm World: Master Project - Japanese Burnt
summary: Japanese Burnt is a Japanese style song pack，Mixed with Japanese elements, having lively rhythm, really awesome!!Strongly recommended!! Including following 4 songs: 1, Sakura Dance 2, Pray Of God 3, Flower Path 4, Advanture

name: Rhythum
summary: You are piloting the Orchestra’s new Rhythum mobile suit unit, when the ship you are on is attacked by a fleet of enemy suits known as the Conductors. Do you have what it takes to survive the Conductors’ attack?

name: Rhythm World: Master Project - Electronica
summary: Following songs are included: 1.Drum & Bass 2.Biubiubiu 3.Circumgyrate (The bgm of trailer.) Really fantastic!

name: Rhythium
summary: Rhythium is an intense, high-tempo rhythm game with challenging combo-based gameplay. With a classic 4 key system along with an amazing range of original indie electronic music.

name: Rhyup
summary: Rhyup is a challenging, 5 button rhythm game with shmup elements. Defend your home planet as you take control of a spaceship and move and shoot to the beat of the music while weaving through an onslaught of eye catching, enemy fire all set to an amazing sound track of 20 unique songs.

name: Rhythmic Gymnastics Dream Team: Girls Dance
Rhythm Master
summary: ‘Rhythm Master’ is a new concept rhythm game in which each stage proceeds in a battle format based on a story. Collect various characters and strategize using their unique abilities to fight against various enemies.

name: Rhythm Defender
summary: Rhythm Defender is a VR Rhythm game where you need to punch UFO's that are trying to invade Earth synced to build-in music tracks or your own music.

name: Rhythm Quest
summary:
Rhythm Quest is the rhythm based roguelike you never knew you wanted!
Make your way down the deadly dungeon, slashing and dodging in time with the ever present demonic beat.

name: RHI Roller Hockey '95
summary:
Cancelled port of Brett Hull Hockey, including the RHI license.

Al Michaels provides a full running commentary, while a mode allowing the player to improve their game with Brett's help is also included. The game is viewed isometrically, with all the realistic fouls and gameplay situations included. Full pre-match analysis and forecasting is provided, as are post match statistics.

name: Rhythm Journey
summary: A vertical rhythm game created by students in the Game Arts Department. All of the music used is original by students.

name: RhythmDanceVR
summary: RhythmDanceVR is a rhythm game where you have to try to hit as many beat fields as possible. Filled with a large selection of songs, it turns your surroundings into a dance club.

name: Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei
summary:
Rhygar is a farmer who lives with his father on their ranch. One day, he needs to sell their cow, only to watch his father being murdered by monsters on the way back home. Now, begins his journey to become a Knight of the King in order to get revenge on the monsters who killed his father.

Rhygar e os Soldados do Rei (Rhygar and the Knights of the King) is one of many free indie brazilian games created using RPG Maker 2000 during the boom of the engine in Brazil in the 2000s. Like others of its kind, it's very unpretentious and full of typos and goofy jokes. It became somewhat of a forgotten classic among brazilian gamers of that era, and its relative success helped the aforementioned boom of other small RPG Maker 2000 brazilian games, including two lesser known sequels.

name: Rhianna Ford & The Da Vinci Letter
summary: Rhianna Ford & The Da Vinci Letter is a hidden objects game.

name: Rhino Puzzle
summary: Solve different puzzles to go forward and collect all skulls in this 3d puzzle game.

name: Rhythm Life
summary: Rhythm Life is a role-playing VR rhythm game where players, on various career paths, use their hands to complete rhythmic challenges and achieve fulfilling lives.

name: Rhythmica
summary:
The arcade rhythm game you can play in your room, it is "Rhythmica". 
 
Rhythmica is an authentic rhythm VR rhythm game that you can enjoy with easy operation. 
The operation consists of three easy actions "push a pad", "pull a trigger", "shake a controller" according to the ball flowing from the four lanes. 
Following the operation feeling like a conventional arcade machine, it is easy to understand for rhythm game fans and first time players, you can enjoy the immersive feeling unique to the rhythm VR game.

name: Rhythm Banki
summary: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Rhythm Good
summary: Help GC Lady! Defeat the boss! Easy and cute painting style, and operation tips will appear before the start of each level. Challenge the high score!

name: Rhyme Storm
summary: Rhyme Storm is a freestyle rapping rhythm game that gets you on the beat with visual guides, flashing words, and 3d visualizers that pulse to the music. It features 6 difficulties across 2 modes that go from easy enough for a total beginner to hard enough for even experienced rappers to feel challenged.

name: Rhythm Heaven
summary: Rhythm Heaven puts the music in your hands and some rhythm in your life. Let the music move you as you tap and slide your stylus on the touch screen to the beat of more than 50 musical rhythm games. The controls are as natural as tapping your finger to music.

name: Rhythm 'n' Face
summary: Rhythm 'n' Face is a rhythm video game developed by OutSide Directors Company and published by Asmik Ace Entertainment for the PlayStation.

name: Rhythm Quest
summary: Rhythm Quest is a 2-button rhythm platformer game. Jump, attack, and fly to the beat through upbeat songs that are hand-crafted to highlight complex rhythms!

name: Rhythm Maker
summary:
Based on the popular Rhythm Box from the award-winning "Private Lesson Series," Rhythm Maker provides a whole set of musical instruments that will play any rhythm you want. 
Use drums, cymbals, congas, and much more in Rock, Metal, Jazz, Latin, Rap & Novelty kits.  
Choose from 25 premade popular rhythm patterns --from Afro-Cuban to Waltz-- or create your own. 
Speed up any rhythm, slow it down, or even change the meter, all while the Rhythm Maker plays. 
Review the combinations and save the ones you like,  
Add punch to any song or dance tune, with Rhythm Maker.

name: Rheksetor: Waves of Fury
summary: Blast through waves of enemy ships, conquer every sector, and help The Order to secure a future among the stars.

name: Rhythm Cat Pro
summary:
A fun game that will help kids and adults learn to read some basic music rhythms.
60 entertaining levels that get progressively more challenging.

name: Rhythm Horizon
summary: Rhythm Horizon is an indie PC athletic rhythm game where players press inputs in time to music.

name: Rhythm Any Music
summary: Play using your own music and get into the rhythm with amazing backgrounds that are automatically generated by your music.

name: Rhythm Fighter
summary: Rhythm! action! Rogue-Like! We combine the rhythm of music with action. Come and follow the rhythm to beat monsters. Chop melons and vegetables to save the earth!

name: Rhythm Brawl
summary: Rhythm Brawl is a versus-rhythm game about taking part in band battles with a story mode based on rivalries between talented musicians. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

name: Rheinland
summary: Let yourself be carried away by Wanderslust and travel down the medieval River Rhine with the musicians. Experience a cozy, narrative-heavy fantasy story. Gather harmony and manage your resources. The key to everything is music, so improvise your own songs since in Rheinland everyone is a musician!

name: Rhythm Realm
summary: The lizardman mob boss condemned your village to a slow, catchy death. One boy, one sword: do you have what it takes to venture through this magical world of music and save them all?

name: Rhythm Girl
summary: Enter the world of music magic book with Kung fu girl and enjoy your travel of music!

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles – Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- The Game
- Mini-artbook
- Double-sided poster

name: Rhythm Tengoku
summary:
A rhythm-action game like no other from the same team that created WarioWare. Rhythm Tengoku contains 48 minigames that put your rhythm to the test in a variety of crazy scenarios.

Rhythm Tengoku was developed by Nintendo R&D1 and released exclusively in Japan for the GBA in 2006 and in arcades with Sega's help in 2007. Being developed by the same studio responsible for the WarioWare games, Rhythm Tengoku mixes the mini-game based gameplay with rhythm game elements, featuring unusually high-quality music for a GBA game. The game started development in 2004. A 2002 prototype for a GBA drum sequencer was incorporated into Rhythm Tengoku as well: the player can freely drum within the Sound Test or take on 19 drum lessons. (Source)

The game contains eight stages with five rhythm games and one remix of the previous five each, adding up to 48 different mini-games total. Each game can be completed without hitting every note perfectly, although doing so will unlock various rhythm-related bonus games and modes, such as a drum set where you have to mimic what the drummer does.

Much like the Wario Ware series of games, Rhythm Tengoku is all about following your senses and trying to be aware of various cues in the visuals and audio. This emphasis on sense instead of language makes it quite easy for anyone to pick up and play, even though the game is entirely in Japanese (and consequently only available in the Asian region or through an import website).

For example, one of the game's levels has you rapping with a computer-controlled character. He'll speak a colour-coded Japanese phrase, and the player must press 'A' in different rhythms. Although the game explains what rhythms to do for which phrase, non-Japanese speaking players can watch hand movements on-screen to figure it out without the need for language.

Occasionally, challenges will crop up, asking you to complete a level without any mistakes. Doing so earns you a certificate for that level, and a pink heart with a 'P' on it appears in that level's description.

name: Rhythm Jungle
summary: Rhythm Jungle is a fun and adorable rhythm simulation game. The bear's daily life in the jungle has been developed into nine chapters. The game will let the player overcome the challenges in each chapter from a brand-new perspective.

name: Rhome
summary: Rhome is a first person dark atmospheric exploration game where players navigate an increasingly chaotic and psychologically unnerving environment to reveal the fate of Hailey Rhome.

name: Rhythm Road
summary: Fast-paced rhythm game with a retro soundtrack

name: RhythmMMO
summary: This extraordinary blend of massively multiplayer gameplay combines the endless freedom and creativity of sandbox worlds with the delightful tempo-driven mechanics of rhythm games.

name: Rhapsody Devoted to the Coffin Sleeping Under the Moon
summary: A role-playing game from Adult's Hobby.

name: Rhythm Drive: Synthwave City
summary: Drive around Synthwave City's open world while completing challenges to unlock new cars. Fully customize every detail of how your car drives or choose from a list of presets. Listen to synthwave, retro, vaporwave tracks and hit the notes to build your boost and pull off some impressive maneuvers!

name: Rhythm Plus
summary: Rhythm plus is a web-based vertical scrolling rhythm game (VSRG), you can make, play, and share any songs from and with anyone!

name: Rhythm Stones
summary:
1. Cross the 3D stepping stones to the beat!
Rhythm Stones is a 3D rhythm game in which you cross the moving stepping stones to the beat. The stepping stones move in various types of 3D space; flat, cylindrical, spherical, and random!
2. Simple controls, but hardcore difficulty!
Rhythm Stones lets you touch anywhere to play, but can you get past all of the difficult beats until the end?
3. But even if you fail, special items allow you to succeed over time!
The more you lose a level, the more health-increasing items appear. No matter how difficult the stage is, if you keep trying you will surely succeed!
4. Enjoy 55 songs in various genres!
Rhythm Stones consists of 55 stages (including 5 tutorials), and each stage consists of a different song in various genres such as rock, funk, jazz, EDM, acoustic, etc.
Contact:

name: Rhythm Station
summary: Shoot to the beat! Rhythm Station is a rhythm-based action roguelike set in space

name: Rhythm Nights
summary: Rhythm Nights is an engaging rhythm experience which creates accurate and adaptive game play to the music, including yours!

name: Rhodes
summary: Edit the map around an auto-walking character in a maze to make them reach targets.

name: Rhythm Mage VR
summary: The rhythm of the universe has been thrown off by a mysterious force. Portals are appearing all over the land, letting frustratingly cute creatures from other dimensions into our world. After many millennia of rest, you must aid Alfred and take up the mantel of Rhythm Mage to restore the rhythm of the universe.

name: Rhentsu
summary: Embark on this adventure in search of a mysterious galactic artifact, full of action and sensual women. Fight different bosses and find out what can happen if this artifact falls into the wrong hands.

name: Rhapsody III: Memories of Marl Kingdom
summary: Dive back into Mark Kingdom through a series of charming stories that concludes the tales of Rhapsody I and Rhapsody II!

name: Rhythm Party
summary: A downloadable rhythm game for Xbox 360 that allows players a bit more freedom with the choreography than the average Kinect dancegame.

name: Rhythmscapes
summary:
Guided by an inner-rhythm spirit, take part in rhythm practices set within immersive visual environments. Enhance your focus and coordination while discovering the essence of your rhythm. Engage in drumming sessions driven by the science of human emotions - all of this is achieved with just your bare hands, and no controllers are needed.

Rhythmscapes makes a groundbreaking leap, synthesizing mindfulness and rhythm-based game mechanics into a single therapeutic experience within immersive VR.

name: Rhyther
summary: Rhyther is a small Rhythm Game inspired by Friday Night Funkin, Created by CodeCloth (Now known as SpinnableBlue) in 2021 and released on GameJolt on August 5th 2021.

name: RhythmSnake
summary: Collect food and lengthen your snake to the rhythm of tracks from your personal music collection!

name: Rhythm World: Master Project - Japanese Soft
summary: Japanese Softis a Japanese style song pack with middle level of BPM.It's not so burning and it's not so deep.Even more, there is a very popular song included.Following songs are included: 1, Bucket 2, Bramble 3, The Last Stand 4, Mirai no Kanata

name: RhythmicTypeX
summary: RhythmicTypeX is an adaptive rhythm game designed to develop typing virtuosity on the keyboard, based on musical rhythmic training techniques used by professional musicians around the world. The game play is designed to easily train with the 10 fingers typing method in a fun way.

name: Rhythm Zone
summary: Rhythm Zone is the new revolution in music gaming! Play using your own music and get into the Rhythm Zone of your favorite indie, electronica, metal, rock, hip hop, and pop songs. Every game session is as different as the songs you choose and is matched to awesome and surreal changing backgrounds that are generated by your music.

name: Rhythm World: Master Project
summary: Rhythm World: Master Projectis a music game combine with simulation system. Dive yourself into the music ocean!

name: Rhythm Spirit
summary: Rhythm games and fighting collide in this iPhone game from Monad Games.

name: Rhythm Witch: Beat Death
summary: Rhythm Witch: Beat Death is a game that melds rhythm and survival. Attack to the rhythm of the music while dodging monsters who move and attack to the beat. On your journey to eternal beauty, defeat dancing freaks, ghouls, dragon, and more!

name: Rhodesia '72
summary: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire Rhodesian Bush War, from Llewellyn Barracks to BMAT (Jul '64 - Dec '79)

name: Rhythm Hive
summary:
HYBE Official Rhythm Game - Rhythm Hive
• BTS, TOMORROW X TOGETHER, ENHYPEN, SEVENTEEN, LE SSERAFIM, NewJeans, BOYNEXTDOOR, ILLIT's music in rhythm games!
Enjoy full or short versions of Artist's songs! One more news! You can even play solo and unit songs!

name: Rhythm Story
summary: Rhythm Story is inspired by the masterpieces of Sally Face and Friday Night Funkin '. This is an easy-to-play detective rhythm game in which all the characters are girls. You have to solve the murder of one of them or to protect the criminal.

name: Rhomb
summary: Puzzle game where the player must untie a knot of rhombuses.

name: Rhythm 'n Notes: Improve Your Music Skills
Rhythm Lust Girl
summary: Rhythm Lust Girl is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Rhythm Retro
summary: With R.P.G. elements, audio calibration settings, an online leaderboard, 7 gold medal achievements, 6 class upgrade ranks, and even keyboard controls for Blue-stack players! This game will work on any mobile device after 2014 with Android OS. You don't even need a touch screen to play! Challenge yourself with 120 unique gameplay combinations! Level up your Retro Boosts and blow the competition away! Creatively unique, and designed to fulfill your enjoyment! Rhythm Retro is the ultimate Tap Rhythm Music Game!

name: Rhythm World: Master Project - Mix! Mix!
summary: Mix! Mix! Multiple music style mixed to comfort your ears. Try it now！

name: Rhythmole
summary: Rhythmole is a musical rhythm whack-a-mole game. Play through hand-made levels or create and share your own with friends!

name: Rhythm League Heroes
summary: Join the musical heroes and enjoy an adventure filled with humor and music! Follow a group of charismatic characters to face diverse enemies through musical battles. Manage your team to advance in the story and discover the different corners of the mysterious Sky Island.

name: RhythmStar
summary:
Get ready to start your musical adventures with the most exciting and fun rhythm game along with cute characters.

Over 80 iconic real life classical musicians turned into heroes with classical and original music.

name: Rhem I SE: The Mysterious Land
summary: Rhem is a first person adventure featuring brain-teasing puzzles for your PC.

name: Rhyme Land
summary:
Rhyme Land is a simple rhyming game for the Apple II.

Players can choose from a number of different cartoon animals, including: foxes, cats, mice, dragons, frogs, bees, and snakes. They then must choose if the displayed words rhyme or don't rhyme with the animal.

name: Rhymo's Falling Star
summary:
Rhymo's Falling Star is 1 - 2 player educational word game for the Apple II.

Players compete in 3 slightly different challenges, where they must type matching rhyming words. In each challenge, the player must complete a total of 15 rhyming words to either help Rhymo catch a falling star, save creatures from a dying planet, or reach his spaceship. Each challenge contains 2 different difficulty levels. At the easier level, the player must type the two words that rhyme. At the harder level, the player is given a word with the first letter missing, and the player must choose 2 of 5 letters that will complete this word. As the player successfully answers questions, they get closer to their goal of helping Rhymo.

name: Rhyme-A-Line
summary:
Rhymo's Falling Star is 1 - 2 player educational word game for the Apple II.

Players compete in 3 slightly different challenges, where they must type matching rhyming words. In each challenge, the player must complete a total of 15 rhyming words to either help Rhymo catch a falling star, save creatures from a dying planet, or reach his spaceship. Each challenge contains 2 different difficulty levels. At the easier level, the player must type the two words that rhyme. At the harder level, the player is given a word with the first letter missing, and the player must choose 2 of 5 letters that will complete this word. As the player successfully answers questions, they get closer to their goal of helping Rhymo.

name: Rhythm Journey
summary: Rhythm Journey is a story based, hardcore 2-buttons rhythm game.

name: R.H.
summary: R.H. is a session-based online first person shooter. As a result of the division of the property of the former Russian Federation, territorial disputes arise between the newly formed states, some of which end in armed clashes that develop into a full-scale war.

name: Rhythm Producer
summary: Rhythm Producer is a rhythm game where players take on the role of a game producer and use four different rhythm game mechanics to complete a series of levels in art, programming, debugging, and review and release. Ultimately, they create a game within the game.

name: Rhythm & Beats
summary: Get into the groove of the beat with Rhythm & Beats. Focused on VR play but supports keyboard and mouse. Play to your favorite songs or playlist with 5 levels of difficulty.

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles – Limited Edition
summary:
The Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Memories in Melody" Hardcover Art Book
- "Ballad of the Little Princess" 2-disc Original Soundtrack
- "Memories of Marl Kingdom" 2-disc Original Soundtrack
- "Royal Crescendo" Art Cards (Set of 3)
- "A Duet of Adventure" Acrylic Display
- "Generations of Song" Acrylic Display
- "The Show Must Go On" Cloth Poster
- Collector's Box

name: Rhetoric Public Speaking Game
summary:
Public speaking. The mere thought of it can set hearts pounding! And yet, being able to communicate one’s ideas in public is an important and sought-after skill.
Rhetoric is an educational game that will help you improve your public speaking skills and have a great time in the process.

name: Rhythm Control 2
summary: Rhythm Control 2 is now free to play and supported by in game ads. Purchase any song pack to remove all the ads. Rhythm Control 2 is finally here with improved gameplay features, a shiny new interface and a surplus of new tracks to play!

name: Rhino Runner
summary: Runner Game where Rhino needs find balloons in different maps and avoid deathly traps.

name: Rhapsody of Zephyr
summary: A side-story to Korean "War of Genesis series", The Rhapsody of Zephyr loosely adapts Alexandre Dumas' novel The Count of Monte Cristo, with protagonist Cyrano Bernstein, a young nobleman looking forward to his wedding to his beloved Mercedes, being framed and cast into a remote island prison for crimes he did not commit.

name: RhythmSlinger
summary: Shoot with style to YOUR songs! RhythmSlinger is a kinetic trick-based VR rhythm shooter that generates fast-paced levels from any audio track.

name: Rhythm Destruction
summary: Rhythm Destruction is a rhythm & shoot'em up that aims to combine the best of both genres. Blast and maneuver your way through perilous stages filled with numerous enemies, obstacles and unique boss encounters. Stay on beat to rack up the highest score possible and compete against others on the global leaderboards!

name: Rhythm Planet
summary: Rhythm Planet is a cute and hilarious game developed by Aoga Technology and published by Gamepoch Star Journey. The game perfectly combines music rhythm with new features of PSVR2, such as adaptive triggers, head-mounted vibration feedback, and surround sound, allowing players to enjoy the fun on dozens of "super parties".

name: Rhythm Soccer
summary: Play with football teams from Brazil, Argentina, Italy, and Germany in an amazing rhythm game! Hit the notes to pass and shoot and win the tournament! With cartoonish visuals and 15 manually synchronized songs, have a lot of fun! Download now and experience the excitement of the rhythm of football!

name: Rhythm Heaven Megamix
summary: Test your rhythm by chopping wood, sticking speeding viruses with forks and playing badminton while flying an airplane, all in time to catchy tunes in this deceptively challenging rhythm game. The accessible controls and catchy music, combined with the new visual feedback system, make this a great entry in the Rhythm Paradise series. Can you match the beat and reach Rhythm Paradise ?

name: RhythMania
summary: An upcoming vibrant rhythm anthology filled with over a dozen dynamic mini-games with minimalistic inputs across musical genres and visual styles!
